metadata.synopsis: The InParty for Karlach while in END_Main.Morphic Pool (Arrival)Astral Plane (Just after Netherbrain Confrontation)Tadpole Choice (with Emperor in Astral Plane while making the choice to transform into a mind flayer. Karlach can transform into a mind flayer)High Hall Interior (after Astral Plane, views of Nautiloids, Dragons, and a city in ruin)

12.speaker: Karlach
12.text: We were so close. We almost had it. But those odds were... impossible.

21.speaker: Karlach
21.text: You can count on me, soldier. I can do this.

22.speaker: Karlach
22.text: Lead on, my love. This place is a horror, but we can do this.

23.speaker: Karlach
23.text: Hup hup, soldier. We have a mission to complete.

38.speaker: Karlach
38.text: Lead on, soldier. This nasty hole has nothing on us.

28.speaker: Player
28.text: Do we have time for one last kiss?

5.speaker: Karlach
5.text: Ah. What were we doing again?
5.context: NodeContext: Right after a kiss. Delirious with it, despite the stressful circumstances.

78.speaker: Player
78.text: I'm a mind flayer now - how do you feel about that?

13.speaker: Karlach
13.text: It should've been me, but what can I say? A few tentacles look good on you.

31.speaker: Player
31.text: How do you feel about being a mind flayer now?

59.speaker: Karlach
59.text: I didn't know there was so much me beyond myself.

47.speaker: Karlach
47.text: And I didn't know I had a chance at life - more life. I'm so... happy.
47.context: NodeContext: Sincere, but maybe a little detached since she's now a mind flayer

58.speaker: Player
58.text: Are you hanging in there all right?

7.speaker: Karlach
7.text: Fuck yes, soldier. I'm burning hard and fast - and ready to fight a big old brain.

45.speaker: Karlach
45.text: We can do this, darling. We're nearly there.

49.speaker: Karlach
49.text: Gods! We were so close, darling. Impossible odds.

66.speaker: Karlach
66.text: This is wild. I'm myself, but... but more.

25.speaker: Karlach
25.text: It's like I'm beyond myself. I can sense things I never knew were there...

30.speaker: Karlach
30.text: And my engine, it's... it's... silent.
30.context: NodeContext: Can't believe what she's feeling.

56.speaker: Karlach
56.text: No heat. No gears. Still there, but no longer threatening to explode. Soldier...

46.speaker: Player
46.text: Karlach - that means you're going to live!

1.speaker: Karlach
1.text: Yes. Yes! My gods - is it possible?

57.speaker: Karlach
57.text: Shit. I'm gonna be all right. I get to be alive. I get to stay.
57.context: NodeContext: Karalch realizing she's going to live. She's excited and emotional, but is a mind flayer now, so less emotional than she would be if she was herself. They are more cerebral, stoic creatures.

29.speaker: Karlach
29.text: As a hideous monster, sure. But one that can feel. Think. Live.

61.speaker: Karlach
61.text: But I'm still myself. And I still love you. And, more than anything, I know what our mission is. Delighted I get to do the honours.

81.speaker: Lae'zel
81.text: I never thought I'd be happy to hear a ghaik will live. Yet my heart is very glad, Karlach.
81.context: InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayer

72.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
72.text: I feel your mind evolving, Karlach... it is beautiful. You are more alive than ever.
72.context: InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayer

68.speaker: Jaheira
68.text: Already at home in your new skin. They never took your heart, girl - they never even touched it.
68.context: NodeContext: Shaking head quietly, amused wonder / pride at Karlach's resilience.

16.speaker: Wyll
16.text: Oh, Karlach. No news could have made me happier in this house of horrors.
16.context: InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayer

42.speaker: Shadowheart
42.text: I'm glad for you, Karlach. It's hardly the life anyone dreams of, but, well... it's a life.
42.context: InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayerNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayer. Arc: SH turned from Shar

37.speaker: Shadowheart
37.text: You'll have to face oblivion another time, it seems. I'm glad for you, if it's what you want.
37.context: InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayerNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayer. Arc: SH is loyal to Shar.

52.speaker: Gale
52.text: I can imagine no finer ceremorph for the job.
52.context: InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayer

14.speaker: Astarion
14.text: I'm so pleased your mind survived the transformation intact. As for the rest of you... well, your mind survived and that's what matters.
14.context: InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayerNodeContext: Astarion's pleased Karlach's surviving, although she has turned into a gross mind flayer, so...

9.speaker: Player
9.text: I'm so happy for you, Karlach. This is incredible.

82.speaker: Karlach
82.text: It is. It is incredible. And I intend to celebrate - after we've defeated the brain.

11.speaker: Player
11.text: This is the first day of the rest of your life. Let's make it a good one.

40.speaker: Karlach
40.text: I'll do you one better than good: Let's do something absolutely legendary.

34.speaker: Player
34.text: We've got a brain to defeat.

4.speaker: Karlach
4.text: Let's finish this thing, soldier. It's time. And I'm ready if you are.

19.speaker: Astarion
19.text: You are indomitable, aren't you? I'm so happy for you, Karlach.
19.context: InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayerNodeContext: Genuinely impressed and very pleased for her

60.speaker: Minsc
60.text: Do you hear that, Boo!? Karlach lives! And this new form will make her all the slippier to grasp in our berserker bouts - a battle for another day.
60.context:
InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayer.
Excited, then thoughtful, then getting back to excitement.

17.speaker: Halsin
17.text: A hard-earned chance at life. You deserve it, Karlach.
17.context: InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayer

39.speaker: Karlach
39.text: But I'm still myself. And I know what our mission is. I'm glad I get to do the honours.

41.speaker: Player
41.text: Are you certain? Maybe your new form has just cooled it down for the moment.

33.speaker: Karlach
33.text: This is something else. Something far deeper. Whatever ceremorphosis did to me, it... it fixed me.

48.speaker: Karlach
48.text: That means... I won't burn out.

70.speaker: Player
70.text: I guess turning into an illithid has its perks.

79.speaker: Karlach
79.text: Here I thought I was making a sacrifice. Thank the gods I'm a noble fuck!

71.speaker: Player
71.text: I don't like the sound of that.

54.speaker: Karlach
54.text: Don't worry, soldier. It's still your old pal under all this purple. But suddenly 'I' am different than I ever knew.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: You look so different. I can hardly recognise you.

76.speaker: Karlach
76.text: I'm not surprised. But I've never felt more like myself.

62.speaker: Player
62.text: I'm so grateful to you, my love.

69.speaker: Karlach
69.text: You don't need to thank me. I somehow feel like... like this was meant for me.

64.speaker: Karlach
64.text: Maybe not the tentacles. But - you know. Bigger picture.

73.speaker: Karlach
73.text: Eyes ahead, soldier. We're nearly there.
